availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Hopkins (Carroll County and Gallatin County farmer)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married Josephena Reed Hopkins. Married Margaret Hopkins. Owned three enslaved persons in Owen County in 1850. Farmer in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 102
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, p. 431
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272769, p. 63
